revision.text:
{{wiktionary|Cleopatra|Κλεοπάτρα}} '''[[Cleopatra]]''' (69-30 BC) was the last active Ptolemaic pharaoh of Egypt before it became a Roman province.
'''Cleopatra''' may also refer to: {{TOC right}} == Given name == * [[Cleopatra (given name)]], a list of people and fictional characters * [[Cleopatra (Greek singer)]] (born 1963), represented Greece in the 1992 Eurovision Song Contest * [[Cleopatra (Greek myth)]], a list of mythological figures
== Film == * [[Cleopatra (1912 film)|''Cleopatra'' (1912 film)]], silent film by Helen Gardner * [[Cleopatra (1917 film)|''Cleopatra'' (1917 film)]], American film by J. Gordon Edwards * [[Cleopatra (1928 film)|''Cleopatra'' (1928 film)]], short film * [[Cleopatra (1934 film)|''Cleopatra'' (1934 film)]], American film by Cecil B. DeMille * [[Cleopatra (1963 film)|''Cleopatra'' (1963 film)]], British-American-Swiss drama by Joseph L. Mankiewicz * [[Cleopatra (1970 film)|''Cleopatra'' (1970 film)]], Japanese anime film * [[Cleopatra (2003 film)|''Cleopatra'' (2003 film)]], Argentine film by Eduardo Mignogna * [[Cleopatra (2005 film)|''Cleopatra'' (2005 film)]], South Indian Tamil film * ''Cléopatra'', 2007 film by [[Júlio Bressane]] * [[Cleopatra (2013 film)|''Cleopatra'' (2013 film)]], South Indian Malayalam film
==Literature== * [[Cleopatra (Rider Haggard novel)|''Cleopatra'' (Rider Haggard novel)]] (1889) * [[Cleopatra (Gardner novel)|''Cleopatra'' (Gardner novel)]], a 1962 novel Jeffrey K. Gardner * [[La Cleopatra (poem)|''La Cleopatra'' (poem)]], an epic poem by Girolamo Graziani
===Classical music=== * [[Cleopatra (Cimarosa)|''Cleopatra'' (Cimarosa)]], a 1789 opera seria by Domenico Cimarosa * ''[[Cleopatra (Rossi)]]'', an 1876 opera by [[Lauro Rossi]] * ''Cleopatra'', an opera by [[Johann Mattheson]] * ''Cleopatra'', a composition by [[Luigi Mancinelli]]
===Popular music=== * [[Cleopatra Records]], an American record label * [[Cleopatra (girl group)]], a British girl group
===Albums=== * [[Cleopatra (album)|''Cleopatra'' (album)]], a 2016 album by The Lumineers * [[Cleopatra (1963 soundtrack)|''Cleopatra'' (1963 soundtrack)]], a soundtrack by Alex North * ''Cleopatra'', a 2004 album by [[Isabel Bayrakdarian]] * ''Handel: Cleopatra'', a 2011 album by [[Natalie Dessay]]
===Songs=== * [[Cleopatra (Frankie Avalon song)|"Cleopatra" (Frankie Avalon song)]] (1963) * [[Cleopatra (Jerome Kern song)|"Cleopatra" (Jerome Kern song)]] (1917) * [[Cleopatra (The Lumineers song)|"Cleopatra" (The Lumineers song)]] (2016) * [[Cleopatra (Weezer song)|"Cleopatra" (Weezer song)]] (2014) * "Cleopatra (I've Got to Get You Off My Mind)", a song by [[The Tennors]] * "Cleopatra", a song by Adam and the Ants from ''[[Dirk Wears White Sox]]'' * "Cleopatra", a song by [[Nico Fidenco]] * "Cleopatra", a song by [[David Vendetta]]
==Paintings== * [[Cleopatra (Artemisia Gentileschi, Ferrara)|''Cleopatra'' (Artemisia Gentileschi, Ferrara)]], by Artemisia Gentileschi, c. 1620 * [[Cleopatra (Artemisia Gentileschi, Milan)|''Cleopatra'' (Artemisia Gentileschi, Milan)]], by Artemisia Gentileschi, 1613 or 1621–1622
==Places== * [[Cleopatra (neighborhood)]], a neighborhood of Alexandria, Egypt * [[Cleopatra, Kentucky]], United States, an unincorporated community * [[Cleopatra, Missouri]], United States, an unincorporated community * [[Cleopatra (crater)]], an impact crater on Venus
==Plants and animals== * [[Cleopatra (horse)]], an American racehorse * [[Cleopatra (gastropod)|''Cleopatra'' (gastropod)]], a genus of freshwater snails * ''[[Gonepteryx cleopatra]]'' or cleopatra, a species of butterfly * ''[[Neoguillauminia cleopatra]]'', a species of tree from New Caledonia
==Ships == * {{HMS|Cleopatra}}, various Royal Navy ships * {{ship||Cleopatra|1839}}, an East India Company paddle frigate built in 1839 and sunk by a tropical cyclone in 1847 * [[Cleopatra (cylinder ship)|''Cleopatra'' (cylinder ship)]], a vessel constructed to convey Cleopatra's Needle from Alexandria to London in 1877 * {{SS|Mohegan}}, originally named ''Cleopatra'', a mixed passenger liner and animal carrier which sank in 1898 * {{SS|United Victory}}, a World War II Victory cargo ship renamed ''Cleopatra'' in 1956
== Television == * [[Cleopatra (miniseries)|''Cleopatra'' (miniseries)]], a 1999 American miniseries produced by Hallmark Entertainment * ''[[The Cleopatras]]'', a 1983 British series
==Other uses== * [[Cleopatra (cigarette)]], an Egyptian brand
== See also == * [[Foxxy Cleopatra]], a character in ''Austin Powers in Goldmember'' * [[Cleopatra Algemene Studentenvereniging Groningen]], a student association in Groningen, the Netherlands * [[Kleopatra (disambiguation)]] * [[Cleo (disambiguation)]]
{{disambiguation|geo|ship}}
